text: Kenneth is an experienced, easy going and dedicated coach. He constantly corrects students to make sure my kids plays tennis the right way while making sure that they still have fun. More importantly, he has a great passion for the sport and he always wants what's best for his students, giving extra time when he's able to or helping them in other ways outside the tennis court!

I have been training with Swing Tennis for over a year having picked up tennis again after 20 years. Kenneth, the coach, works systematically and patiently on your game starting with basic ground strokes, serve, volley and slice. He focuses on getting form and structure correct, and then on movement and footwork to build a strong consistent foundation that will serve anyone at any level.
He adapts his program to fit your needs and fitness level, whether you are a social player or aspire to play competitively.
The big advantage of  working with Swing Tennis is that it provides opportunities to play with other players of a similar level at group sessions, including even in-house or inter-club tournaments to hone your skills and enjoy the game in a non-threatening friendly environment.

Highly recommend Swing Tennis for players of all levels and ages. Super fun crowd!

Kenneth is a dedicated coach who takes the time to work on your techniques and overall game play.
